title: Sand Serpent
body:
Sand Serpent

"Finally we are here," Evan said while narrowing his eyes because of the bright sunlight. 

Currently, he was standing at the top of the hill while looking at the endless desert in front of him. 

After travelling for more than ten hours, Evan finally reached at his destination.

While travelling they encounter many B and B+ rank monsters, but they were no match for Evan and his shadow undead so he got some extra cores from them.

Another thing that made him happy was the fact that his shadow undead doesn't get tired and have unlimited stamina. 

While coming here they didn't rest even for a moment, but they were still in their top condition. 

If Evan come here by himself, it would have taken him at least one day to reach here. 

But since he was riding on Eclipse who can run all day without getting tired, he reached here so early.
